content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: CreateZoneRecord path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/zones/{zone_id}/records content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name zoneid
desc a dns zone id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum create a record
zoneupdatezonerecordmessage
zoneupdatezonerecordmessage
type obj
props
name
type str
desc a zone records name
zonerecordtype
type str
default empty
desc the resource record types supported by stackpath

 empty the resource record has no type
  a the resource record translates a host to an ipv4 address
  aaaa the resource record translates a host to an ipv6 address
  cname the resource record aliases one name to another
  txt the resource record contains a descriptive string many applications use txt records for configuration
  mx the resource record defines a mail exchanger for the given host
  srv the resource record defines a service on the domain
  ns the resource record describes a nameserver that serves its domains zone and records
  caa the resource record describes a certification authority authorization that adds validation to which certificate authorities can issue certificates for a domain
ttl
type integer
format int32
desc a zone records time to live

a records ttl is the number of seconds that the record should be cached by dns resolvers use lower ttl values if you expect zone records to change often use higher ttl values for records that wont change to prevent extra dns lookups by clients
data
type str
desc a zone records value

mx record data follows the format   without s
weight
type integer
format int32
desc a zone records priority

a resource record is replicated in stackpaths dns infrastructure the number of times of the records weight giving it a more likely response to queries if a zone has records with the same name and type
labels
type str
desc a key/value pair of userdefined labels for a dns zone record

zone record labels are not processed by stackpath and are solely used for users to organize their dns zones
required true
responses
200
zonecreatezonerecordresponse
type obj
zonezonerecord
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a zone records unique id
zoneid
type str
desc the id of the zone that a zone record belongs to
name
type str
desc a zone records name

use the value  to denote current root domain name
type
type str
desc a zone records type

zone record types describe the zone records behavior for instance a zone records type can say that the record is a name to ip address value a name alias or which mail exchanger is responsible for the domain see https//supportstackpathcom/hc/enus/articles/360001085563whatdnsrecordtypesdoesstackpathsupport for more information
class
type str
desc a zone records class code

this is typically in for internet related resource records
ttl
type integer
format int32
desc a zone records time to live

a records ttl is the number of seconds that the record should be cached by dns resolvers use lower ttl values if you expect zone records to change often use higher ttl values for records that wont change to prevent extra dns lookups by clients
data
type str
desc a zone records value

mx record data follows the format   without s
weight
type integer
format int32
desc a zone records priority

a resource record is replicated in stackpaths dns infrastructure the number of times of the records weight giving it a more likely response to queries if a zone has records with the same name and type
labels
type str
desc a key/value pair of userdefined labels for a zone record

zone record labels are not processed by stackpath and are solely used for users to organize their dns zones
created
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone record was created
updated
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone record was last updated
desc a dns zones resource record

a zone record describes an individual piece of dns functionality in a dns zone
desc a response from a request to create a new dns zone resource record
title: 21_Resource Records_CreateZoneRecord_113.json
